attributes.action: To consider a vote of no confidence in the entire government
attributes.additional_details: The evidence Is real people's lives. The references are common knowledge.
attributes.background: This government is not acting in the bests interests of the well being of the population or like a democracy should. It's out of control. When is enough, enough? For example, think NHS; Doctor's  strike; Housing Bill/rising poverty & homelessness; Bedroom tax; Google tax; Disabled; Prisons; etc, etc
